name: Skeleton Evolution
author: 静孤与寞
content: Jiang Cheng, a man who unexpectedly finds himself reincarnated into a fantastical game world as a lowly skeleton, summoned by a group of beautiful female players using dark necromancy. To his dismay, this skeleton is no ordinary minion it&#039s the epitome of cannon fodder, barely worth a second glance! But fortune smiles upon him, for he possesses an extraordinary ability—the Infinite Evolution System!With this newfound power, Jiang Cheng embarks on a remarkable journey, evolving from a mere sk
